items.title: The Ethereum Foundation's Commitment to DeFi
items.summary: DeFi isn't a speculative bet on the future. It's the inevitable evolution of finance, driven by a fundamental truth: financial autonomy is a right, not a privilege. And it's been a critical driver of Ethereum's growth and adoption. We want‚Ä¶
